articles.title: Polygon dApp volume crosses $100M: Will this help MATIC's price? - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: Polymarket, a prediction market dApp on Polygon, experiences surging activity, as trading volumes cross $100 million.
articles.content:
• Polygon’s dApp Polymarkets did more than $100 million in terms of volume and also saw a surge in activity.
  • MATIC’s price and Network Growth declined.
